name: Synth Riders
abstract: Let the music move you as you catch notes, ride the rails, and dodge obstacles in a unique combination of freestyle dancing & fitness workout with 68+ included songs and 10-player multiplayer!

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, German, French, Spanish, Japanese, Korean
detail.app_release_note:
Release Notes - Version 2.3.26.a10 (Global)

Synth Riders goes “Back to the Synths” to celebrate 5 years of riding the rails with the “Synthwave Essentials Volume 3” music pack!  Enjoy these five free new tracks in “Back to the Synths”, one of our original play Stages which has received a special “glow-up” to coincide with our birthday!

What's New:
- Addition of "Synthwave Essentials Volume 3"
- Updated visuals for the "Back to the Synths" play stage, select it with the STAGES button on the Song Select screen.
- Minor cosmetic fixes.
 
As always we welcome your feedback and bug reports on our Official Discord server (Invite: http://discord.synthridersvr.com/) or in the Synth Riders Official Community on Facebook.

If you want to support the development of Synth Riders, we really appreciate reviews left in the store!
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo2, PICO Neo2 Lite, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
